00001 /*
00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "strings.h"
00009 #include "enum_MavenQuotes.h"
00010 
00011 StringList splitCommas(string line) {
00012         StringList r;
00013         string token = "";
00014         MavenQuotes inQuotes = MQ_NONE;
00015         int bracketCount = 0;
00016         for(int i = 0; i < line.length(); ++i) {
00017                 // bracket counting
00018                 if(line[i] == '(') ++bracketCount;
00019                 else if(line[i] == ')') --bracketCount;
00020                 
00021                 // quotes
00022                 if(line[i] == '\'' && (i == 0 || line[i - 1] != '\\')) {
00023                         if(inQuotes == MQ_NONE) inQuotes = MQ_SINGLE;
00024                         else inQuotes = MQ_NONE;
00025                 }
00026                 if(line[i] == '"' && (i == 0 || line[i - 1] != '\\')) {
00027                         if(inQuotes == MQ_NONE) inQuotes = MQ_DOUBLE;
00028                         else inQuotes = MQ_NONE;
00029                 }
00030                 
00031                 // do split
00032                 if(line[i] == ',' && inQuotes == MQ_NONE && !bracketCount) {
00033                         token = trim(token);
00034                         if(token.length()) r.push(token);
00035                         token = "";
00036                 } else token += line[i];
00037         }
00038         token = trim(token);
00039         if(token.length()) r.push(token);
00040         return r;
00041 }
